name: International Consumer Goods
notes: International Consumer Goods or ICG is the employer of the subject, Kenton Archer. This is an international company with approximately 4000 employees who are based mainly in the UK, USA, Japan, Switzerland, and India. Head office is in Switzerland and there are local branches in most western and Asian countries. Much manufacturing is done in India although some also in Europe. Most R&D is done in the UK and Switzerland. Kenton works in a team of 7 people in the UK called the Business Development Group (BDG), which is responsible for developing new business relationships with customers and partners

name: Fresco Superstores
notes: This is one of ICG's biggest customers in the UK

name: Consumer Products Conglomerate Ltd
notes: This is one of ICG's biggest business competitors

name: LADL
notes: Kenton is trying to win this German-based supermarket chain as a customer

name: AquaClean
description: A multi-purpose, eco-friendly cleaning solution designed for household use.

name: EnergizePlus
description: A high-energy, low-sugar protein bar targeted at athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

name: SilkSkin
description: A dermatologically-tested moisturizing cream for sensitive skin types.

name: BreezeAir
description: A smart, energy-efficient air purifier for home and office environments.

name: QuickCook
description: An advanced, multi-functional kitchen appliance for quick and healthy meal preparations.

name: Globemart
notes: A large retail chain with stores across the USA, known for a wide range of consumer goods.

name: Sunshine Electronics
notes: Specializes in consumer electronic products, with a strong presence in the European market.

name: EcoHome Stores
notes: A UK-based retail chain focusing on eco-friendly and sustainable household products.

name: DailyNeeds Inc.
notes: A fast-growing company in the consumer goods sector, competing directly with ICG in multiple markets.

name: HealthFirst Global
notes: A multinational corporation specializing in health and wellness products, competing with ICG's health-related product lines.
